title: Spooked by ChatGPT, US Lawmakers Want to Create an AI Regulator
description: At a congressional hearing senators from both parties and OpenAI CEO Sam Altman said a new federal agency was needed to protect people from AI gone bad.

title: California Truckers Brace for a Rule Mandating Electric Vehicles at Ports
description: Starting in 2024, trucks bought for use in California ports and railyards must be zero emission—a move to cut pollution that is also vexing some operators.

title: How Humanity Can Avoid an AI Takeover
description: We talk to MIT professor Daron Acemoglu about his book Power and Progress and unpack why making direct human-to-AI comparisons isn't necessarily helpful in determining our relationship with technology.
